title: hyperverse
text:
hyperverse


A modular R ecosystem for building modern web applications, the web way.

Get started →




    ↗
    htmxr
    Core — htmx primitives and plumber2 integration. Build server-driven web apps without writing JavaScript.
    CRAN 0.1.1
  

    
    alpiner
    Alpine.js wrapper for R — declarative client-side logic without leaving the R ecosystem.
    Planned
  

    
    supar
    Supabase client for R — query your database over HTTP without writing SQL.
    Planned
  
    Explore the ecosystem →

title: Ecosystem
text:
↗
    htmxr
    Core — htmx primitives and plumber2 integration. Build server-driven web apps without writing JavaScript.
    CRAN 0.1.1
  

    ↗
    htmxr.bootstrap
    Opinionated Bootstrap 5 layer on top of htmxr. Ready-to-use UI components with classes applied automatically.
    In development
  

    
    htmxr.daisy
    Opinionated DaisyUI layer on top of htmxr. Modern, accessible components with a minimal footprint.
    Planned
  

    
    alpiner
    Alpine.js wrapper for R — declarative client-side logic without leaving the R ecosystem.
    Planned
  

    
    supar
    Supabase client for R — query your database over HTTP without writing SQL.
    Planned
